tool_description: This is the cheapest with no-cap on request limit ChatGPT API that helps create the content for 6 major social media platforms YouTube, Facebook/ Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Twitter. It also has an option for custom content creation. It is using OpenAI ChatGPT gpt-3.5-turbo context with completion endpoint. We have generated multiple social media templates tailored for your needs so that you only have to type to the point minimal words and leave rest on our templates to see the magic.
name: ChatGPT for Social Media & eCommerce
title: ChatGPT for Social Media & eCommerce

api_list.name: Generate Content
api_list.description: This endpoint is using **gpt-3.5-turbo** model of ChatGPT with completion endpoint.

required_parameters.name: Description
required_parameters.description:
Describe the content requirement within 500 characters. 
Use the relevant keywords in the description for better result.

required_parameters.name: Style
required_parameters.description: Choose from a variety of styles to suit your content.

required_parameters.name: Tone
required_parameters.description: Choose from a range of options to match your brand voice

required_parameters.name: Template
required_parameters.description:
Represents the prompt template for social media platform for which the content needs to be generated. This helps in generating more relevant content by ChatGPT model.

Variants:

  • Youtube_Ad_Creation - (For example - Affordable bicycles for teens)
  • Youtube_Script_Generator - (For example - Top five indoor plants)
  • Youtube_Shorts_Script - (For example - California housing trends)
  • Youtube_Title_And_Description - (For example - Outdoor furniture, affordable outdoor furniture)
  • Youtube_Transcript_To_Article - Give any transcript from any Youtube video and this template will generate an article for you in without reusing article words, in its own way. Power of Artificial Intelligence.
  • Tiktok_Video_Idea - (For example - How to get wrinkle free skin)
  • Tiktok_Script_Writer - (For example - How to take care of Indoor plants)
  • Engaging_Twitter_Thread - (For example - Investing in Stock Market)
  • Keywords_For_Pinterest - (For example - Indoor plants)
  • Pinterest_Titles - (For example - How to take care of Indoor Plants)
  • Pinterest_Description_Generator - (For example - How to take care of Indoor Plants)
  • LinkedIn_Post_Creator - (For example - Job Interview tips)
  • LinkedIn_Bio_Generator - (For example - Intersecting with client and software team. Getting requirements. Follow Agile methodology. Developing and maintaining applications)
  • LinkedIn_Ad_Generator - (For example - Open Technical writer role)
  • Facebook_Post_Ideas_Generator - (For example - Toddler toys sale this weekend)
  • Facebook_Group_Post_Generator - (For example - Best kids toy for ages 3 to 5)
  • Facebook_Ad_Creator - (For example - Toddler toys sale this weekend)
  • Custom - It's a free form text option and not associated with any template. You can use this option to communicate with ChatGPT in any language tone or style you want.

optional_parameters.name: Transcript
optional_parameters.description:
Provide the transcript within 1000 characters. This field is applicable only with 
Youtube_Transcript_To_Article template type. For other all other template types
this field value will get ignored.
